meanings.definition: Gomers: a slang term for a foolish or incompetent person
meanings.sent1: The teacher scolded the gomers for not paying attention in class.
meanings.sent2: The group project failed because the gomers didn't do their part.
meanings.sent3: The gomers tried to fix the broken computer by hitting it with a hammer.
meanings.sent4: In the land of productivity, the gomers were the kings of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gomers' antics was forever etched in everyone's memory.

meanings.definition: Gomers: a plural form of the word 'gomer', referring to multiple foolish or incompetent people
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the gomers kept interrupting with silly questions.
meanings.sent2: The party was a disaster with all the gomers causing trouble.
meanings.sent3: The gomers decided to have a dance-off to settle their differences.
meanings.sent4: The team of gomers stumbled through the task like a herd of confused sheep.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the laughter of the gomers, oblivious to their own absurdity.
